programme.title: Capital Connection
programme.desc: Capital Connection delivers the latest developments from Asia's markets, and primes traders for the Middle East and European trading day. An hour of market scrutiny that gives investors and traders the necessary information to make the best possible decisions.

programme.title: Squawk Box Europe
programme.desc: CNBC presents its flagship show revolving around the world of business, and business issues. Focusing on the European markets, the show's anchors invite leading business executives for open conversation and debate, as well as policymakers and financial strategists to provide their vision and commentary on the key points on the market.

programme.title: Street Signs
programme.desc: Street Signs provides CNBC's viewers with the latest updates on business all over the globe. The program focuses on the day's market action, presents perspectives by prominent analysts, investors, executives and business sharks. Track the stock market openings, be the first to get the real-time insights and current view of stocks, take a chance to capitalize on the plays of the day.

programme.title: Worldwide Exchange
programme.desc: Anchored by Brian Sullivan, Worldwide Exchange delivers news updates from the world of business to viewers across the globe. This informative, newsroom-based show focusses on the major business stories of the day, both from inside the U.S. and the rest of the world. With skillful reporters to unlock the scope of each story and informed guests to share their opinions, the show covers every morsel of international business.

programme.title: US Squawk Box
programme.desc: Join hosts Becky Quick, Joe Kernen and Andre Ross Sorkin as they discuss the latest market movements. With experts on hand to provide detailed analysis, Squawk Box provides valuable information for investors and traders, helping them to cut through the noise and make informed decisions. We speak with the prominent names in the world of business and politics to hear their experiences and stories from their respective industries.

programme.title: US Squawk on the Street
programme.desc: Broadcast live from the New York Stock Exchange, join presenters Carl Quintanilla, David Faber, Jim Cramer and Sara Eisen as they introduce the day's trading. The team attempt to make sense of the squawking that the stock exchange is famed for, as they take viewers to the desks where the biggest companies do business. Not to be missed for aspiring investors or anyone interested in trade.

programme.title: Halftime Report
programme.desc: Hosted by Scott Wapner, Halftime Report infiltrates the trading floor to reveal the key stories pertinent to today's investors. Employing the thoughts and opinions of some of Wall Street's top investors, the show delivers an amalgamation of news updates, financial movements, and national and international business developments, helping to set the blueprint for the remainder of the day.

programme.title: The Exchange
programme.desc: The Exchange provides today's investors with news updates from the around the world, giving them the knowledge to make the requisite, informed decisions. Hosted by anchor Kelly Evans, the newsroom-based show employs a team of skilled reporters to obtain the inside story, unlocking the pertinent information beneficial to those having to make difficult investment decisions.

programme.title: The Exchange

programme.title: Power Lunch
programme.desc: Examining the economy, politics, technology, real estate, financial markets and more, Tyler Mathisen, Melissa Lee and Kelly Evans dissect the latest developments and stories from across the world. The show utilises the knowledge of first-rate reporters and informed commentators to keep viewers up to date and in the know. Laced with personality, the show brings you award-winning business news coverage.

programme.title: Closing Bell
programme.desc: The trading day brings often unforeseeable developments, with the final hour usually the most important timeframe for any investor. Closing Bell guides viewers through this pertinent hour of the trading day, closely examining how markets are reacting, why they are doing so, and how investors are responding. Traders, commentators, analysts, money managers and CEOs also deliver their insight on the day's breaking stories.

programme.title: Closing Bell
programme.desc: The trading day brings often unforeseeable developments, with the final hour usually the most important timeframe for any investor. Closing Bell guides viewers through this pertinent hour of the trading day, closely examining how markets are reacting, why they are doing so, and how investors are responding. Traders, commentators, analysts, money managers and CEOs also deliver their insight on the day's breaking stories.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: Get the most fascinating details and stories after the closing bell rings. The volatility of the markets is here to remind that anything can happen at the end of the trading day. Get the latest business news and updates on the events at the New York Stock Exchange, and follow the acts of the investors and their reactions to what's going on. Biggest names in business and finance, top managers of companies and strategists share their ideas and discuss the trading results and plans.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime

programme.title: US Fast Money
programme.desc: Hosted by Melissa Lee, this fast-paced discussion show invites top traders to have their say on the developing stories from the business world, focussing on economic issues and the important facts for investors.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon
programme.desc: Jimmy Fallon with guests, and musical performance.

programme.title: NBC Nightly News
programme.desc: Join American journalist Lester Holt as he provides a comprehensive report on the latest national and international stories, featuring interviews with the relevant persons involved in the day's news. Lester and his guests offer adept analysis to help you make sense of the frantic stories emerging from the world of politics, economics and social issues. Nightly News also features a segment titled Making a Difference, where we celebrate ordinary Americans doing extraordinary deeds to benefit their surrounding local communities.

programme.title: US Closing Bell
programme.desc: Hosted by Sara Eisen and Wilfred Frost, Closing Bell brings you coverage of the final and most important hour of the trading day. The show provides insight to traders and investors by interviewing experts, CEOs and analysts, listening to their observations on the movements in the market. With live reports from stock exchanges across the USA, aspiring investors are given an informative platform from which to make informed and sensible decisions. Closing Bell also presents analysis of profit reports from a number of different corporations and speaks with wealthy executives who reveal how they spend their money and time.

programme.title: US Closing Bell

programme.title: Managing Asia
programme.desc: Christine Tan speaks with ST Engineering's president and CEO, Vincent Chong, about how he is driving change in the technology, defense, and engineering giant to help strengthen the group's position as the world's largest commercial airframe maintenance, repair, and overhaul provider.
